name: Cypress School of San Francisco
description: Preschool programming provides a full day, full year school located in the Presidio of San Francisco, offering educational programs for children ages 2 - 5. Program Enrichment - During the course of the school year, teachers have various guests, programs, and field trips connected to the children’s inquiry-based project work helping to spark wonder, and connection, and ultimately deepen their thinking. Enrichment Activities - During the week guest partners offer a robust slate of programming. Cu
